subject: Re: [junit] Suggestion for new matchers
msgSnippet: There are property matchers in Hamcrest. Is that what you wanted? S. ... Steve Freeman http://www.mockobjects.com
messageBody:
There are property matchers in Hamcrest. Is that what you wanted?

S.

On 11 Jun 2010, at 23:16, mickus.mykolas wrote:
>
> Now here is how one would make similar assertions with FlexUnit 4:
>
> store.sellItem(item);
> assertThat( store, hasProperties (
> "itemsInStock": 10,
> "currentStoreValue": 720.5,
> ...
> "items": hasItems (
> hasProperties( "name": "Bread", "price": 10 ),
> hasProperties( "name": "Apple", "price": 2 )
> )
> ));
>
> (You can find more information regarding FlexUnit and property (object) matchers here:
> http://docs.flexunit.org/index.php?title=Main_Page
> http://wiki.github.com/drewbourne/hamcrest-as3/matchers-objects)

Steve Freeman
http://www.mockobjects.com
http://www.growing-object-oriented-software.com

Winner of the Agile Alliance Gordon Pask award 2006
